name: WhatsApp Consulting
description: Add a WhatsApp button that connects clients directly to your consulting services. Perfect for consultants, advisors, and professional service providers looking to offer personalized consultation and expert guidance through WhatsApp!

settings.content:
👋 Welcome to [Your Consulting Firm] 💡

Thank you for your interest in our consulting services!

🌟 OUR EXPERTISE:

• Market Analysis
• Growth Planning
• Process Optimization

• Change Management

• Risk Management
• Financial Modeling

✨ WHY CHOOSE US?

✅ Tailored Solutions - Customized to your needs
✅ Results-Driven - Measurable outcomes
✅ Ongoing Support - We're here for you

📍 CONTACT INFORMATION:

🌐 Website: [Your Website]

📍 Office: [Your Address]

🎯 CONSULTATION PROCESS:
